page.title: 01Tourists In St Davids
page.content: Many tourists come to St Davids, mainly to see the Cathedral and to see the coastal views. Also old people come here to get fresh air and to see the countryside. There are many places to stay in St Davids. There is the Grove Hotel, The Old Cross & St Nons. Also there are many guest houses. Other accomodation like caravan and tent parks are available. Also there are self_catering cottages. Many people drive here or come by coach. Many tourists come back to St Davids year after year. Why is this? Maybe it is because of the wonderful sights. It might be the food and accomodation. It might the Welsh community. Lots of people stay here for a week. The majority of people who come by coach only stay for the day but some coach parties stay for the week.
